sense.def:
To cling to someone or something
pomeni tesno držati nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: I clung to the door to support myself.

sense.def:
Kadar oblačila
cling
, se tesno oprimejo telesa, ko se premikamo.

seg.quote: The dress clung tight to Etta's waist.

sense.def:
To cling to someone
pomeni, da nekomu ne omogočimo dovolj svobode ali neodvisnosti.

seg.quote: A working woman is not so likely to cling to her children when they leave home.
There was something weak and clinging in his nature.

sense.def:
To cling to an idea or way of behaving
pomeni nenehno verjeti v vrednost ali pomen neke zamisli ali vedenja, čeprav ni več veljavno ali koristno.

seg.quote: They cling to all the old, inefficient methods of doing things.
